creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: wide skirted, long sleeved dark red dress with embroidered black velvet across front of shoulders and along open neckline and waist; embroidered leaves and stems on bodice front; green fringe on sides of bodice with tiny metallic(?) discs attached; skirt is gathered at waist line and has 3 rows of lace near bottom; sleeves are gathered at cuffs and end with bands of embroidered black velvet; bodice and sleeves are lined with dark blue fabric which has purple and cram diamond design
title: Dress
